articles.content: Budweiser have cheekily handed out beers to all the goalkeepers Lionel Messi has scored against throughout his glittering career. Barcelona’s iconic striker broke Pele’s record of 643 goals for a sin… [+1988 chars]

articles.title: Two new contenders for Harden as $753k silver lining emerges - Fox Sports
articles.description: Well, after initially being criticised for being too selective in his potential trade destinations, it appears that James Harden’s list of suitable landing spots continues to expand.
articles.content:
The AthleticsSam Amick reports that both the Boston Celtics and Portland Trail Blazers have been added to his list of preferred destinations.
